definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: wild goat (?) only De 14:5 in list of clean animals [[וׇזׇ֑מֶר אַיׇּל וּחְבִי וְיַחְמוּר וְאַקּוֹ וְדִישׁוֹן וּתְאוֹ]] (LXX o)/ruc, SyrVer Targum ibex; cf. Bo:Hieroz. i. 900 f., Thes sub [[אנק]] cf. MV, with ref. to Ar. 9n0q goat; Thes comp. also Talm. [[אִיקָא]], but NHWB MV refer this to ai)/c).
